title: Job Advertisement
welcomeText: Job purpose: The Principal is responsible for leading, managing, and developing the Presidential School to ensure that it provides the highest standards of education and pastoral care to all students. The principal is also responsible for developing and maintaining effective relationships with all stakeholders, including PIIMA, students, staff, parents, the Board of Governors/Trustees, HR, and the wider community.
seoDescription: A quickstart for Nuxt & Netlify CMS
